mapper.insert: insert into team (team_name, team_member_max_count, team_level, team_activity_area) values (#{teamName}, #{teamMemberMaxCount}, #{teamLevel}, #{teamActivityArea});
mapper.select: select t.id, t.team_name, t.team_member_max_count, t.team_level, t.team_activity_area, u.user_id from team t left join team_membership tm on t.id = tm.team_id left join user u on tm.user_fk = u.id where tm.role = '팀장';

select t.id, t.team_name, t.team_member_max_count, t.team_level, t.team_activity_area, u.user_id from team t left join team_membership tm on t.id = tm.team_id left join user u on u.id = tm.user_fk where t.id = #{teamId} and role = '팀장';
